Description

Big-selling perennial reggae-lite joker Shaggy&#039;s career hasweathered many a storm, and this best-of collection foregrounds the most popular moments from it. The then-ubiquitous &#039;Boombastic&#039; from 1995 is still humorously brazen and probably his most well-known song, while later efforts such as &#039;It Wasn&#039;t Me&#039; prove that he could still find success with a variant on this formula. Elsewhere, the Steve Miller-sampling &#039;Angel&#039; and other similarly light-hearted dancehall-inspired efforts ensure that Shaggy&#039;s legacy will be one built on making audiences laugh as well as sing along.
